Fictional Worlds & Universes.name: Pop Culture Pantheon
Fictional Worlds & Universes.description: Test your knowledge of beloved characters and iconic moments from film, television, and literature. From galactic heroes to mischievous spies, this quiz covers a wide range of fictional universes. Are you a true pop culture aficionado?

questions.text: In the movie 'Star Wars' what kind of creature is Chewbacca?
questions.hint: This species is known for its tall, furry appearance and loyalty as a co-pilot.

questions.text: What is the name of the POW camp where 'Hogan's Heroes' are held?
questions.hint: The name includes a German term for a prisoner-of-war camp.

questions.text: What cartoon character traveled in a time machine with Mr. Peabody?
questions.hint: This character is a young boy who learns history through time-travel adventures.

questions.text: In the movie 'Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me' what is the name of Dr. Evil's diminutive clone?
questions.hint: The name is a playful reference to his small size and resemblance to Dr. Evil.

questions.text: What animated character has a crush on the Little Red Haired Girl?
questions.hint: This character is a lovable loser from the 'Peanuts' comic strip.

questions.text: What fictional character claims to be 'smarter than the average bear'?
questions.hint: This character is a picnic basket-stealing bear from Jellystone Park.

questions.text: In the famous ballet 'The Nutcracker' who does the hero defeat?
questions.hint: This villain leads an army of rodents in the story's battle scene.

Fictional Worlds & Universes.name: Classic Cartoon Crossroads
Fictional Worlds & Universes.description: Relive the golden age of animation with this quiz focused on memorable characters and storylines. From POW camps to time-traveling adventures, this quiz will challenge your memory of beloved cartoons. Can you navigate this animated landscape?

Fictional Worlds & Universes.name: Villains & Time Machines
Fictional Worlds & Universes.description: Delve into the quirky and chaotic worlds of villains, time travel, and iconic moments. This quiz explores the darker corners of fictional universes, testing your knowledge of memorable antagonists and extraordinary adventures. Are you ready to face the challenge?

Fictional Worlds & Universes.name: Galactic & Archie Adventures
Fictional Worlds & Universes.description: Journey through a universe of iconic characters and storylines, from the vastness of space to the familiar streets of Riverdale. This quiz combines the excitement of galactic battles with the charm of classic comic book adventures. How well do you know these beloved worlds?
